conbody.p:
You can use the following Java-related grok patterns to define the structure of log data:
JAVACLASS (?:[a-zA-Z$_][a-zA-Z$_0-9]*\.)*[a-zA-Z$_][a-zA-Z$_0-9]*
JAVAFILE (?:[A-Za-z0-9_. -]+) A space character is allowed to match special cases, such as Native Method or Unknown Source.
JAVAMETHOD (?:(<init>)|[a-zA-Z$_][a-zA-Z$_0-9]*)
JAVASTACKTRACEPART %{SPACE}at %{JAVACLASS:class}\.%{JAVAMETHOD:method}\(%{JAVAFILE:file}(?::%{NUMBER:line})?\) The line number is optional in special cases, such as Native Method or Unknown Source.
